abstract: Blockbuster’s creditors, led by the billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn, will face serious challenges in turning the company around, despite its advantages over some of its competitors.
snippet: Blockbuster’s creditors, led by the billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn, will face serious challenges in turning the company around, despite its advantages over some of its competitors.
lead_paragraph: With its bankruptcy filing, Blockbuster is moving down a road to become a leaner video-rental company with its creditors in charge. But those creditors, led by the billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn, will face serious challenges in turning around Blockbuster, despite its advantages over some of its competitors.

headline.main: The Challenges Facing Icahn at Blockbuster
